attributes.action: Call an immediate general ection for the sake of democracy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the public outcry about expenses being claimed by MP's all information should be published. We then have an election and let the people decide what is fair and within the rules for their local MP.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
